person.persName: Anderson Rowan Byers (Lieutenant in the 35th Kentucky Infantry)

body.p: Kentucky physician and soldier. Lived in Grayson County, Kentucky in 1860. Married twice, first to Elizabeth Park Byers, and following her death to Sarah E. Felix Byers. Father of Mary E Byers, Jesse Anderson Byers, Charles C. Byers, Erasmus B. Byers, and Otha E. Byers. Served as a 1st lieutenant in the 17th Kentucky Infantry (Co. H) from October 1863 to December 1864.
